Threat_Detection_Blood.NAME: Threat Detection
Threat_Detection_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Rolling_avoiding_Blood.NAME: Red Moon
Rolling_avoiding_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Taboo. NL Remove all Block from the enemy, then gain Block equal to 50% of the amount removed.

Collision_Blood.NAME: Bloody Smash
Collision_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt (excluding Cleave damage). NL Apply !M! Insanity.

Gradually_Crazy_Blood.NAME: Progressive Madness
Gradually_Crazy_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Gain 1 Bloodthirst. Draw 1 card. NL  Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
Gradually_Crazy_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Lose 2 HP. NL Gain 1 Bloodthirst. Draw 1 card. NL  Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

Tyranny_Blood.NAME: Tyranny
Tyranny_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you lost HP this turn, put a card from your discard pile to the top of your draw pile.

VampiricTouch_Blood.NAME: Vampire's Touch
VampiricTouch_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Lose 2 HP. Deal !D! damage. NL If you are below 50% of maximum HP, heal 2 HP.

BrutalStrikes_Blood.NAME: Brutal Attack
BrutalStrikes_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has at least !M! different debuffs, gain [E].

TheErosionOfBlood.NAME: Spilled Blood
TheErosionOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you lost HP this turn, gain 4 additional Block and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

SpiritualDiffusion_Blood.NAME: Spiritual Diffusion
SpiritualDiffusion_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M Insanity. NL If the target has Taboo, apply 3 Taboo.

BannedGames_Blood.NAME: Forbidden Games
BannedGames_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you lost HP this turn, deal 3 additional damage and apply !M! Taboo.

HeartBreaking_Blood.NAME: Heartbreaker
HeartBreaking_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. If this card triggers Cleave, draw 2 cards.

Sprinkle_Blood.NAME: Blood Spray
Sprinkle_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Apply 1 Insanity to each enemy hit.

ForbiddenFruits_Blood.NAME: Forbidden Fruit
ForbiddenFruits_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This turn, Cleave cannot trigger.

TwoCombos_Blood.NAME: Double Combo
TwoCombos_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Lose 1 HP. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times.

TheExistenceOfBlood.NAME: Bloody Existence
TheExistenceOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. If this card triggers Cleave, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

BloodFrenzy.NAME: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Bloodthirst and draw 1 card.

CounterBarrier_Blood.NAME: Counter Barrier
CounterBarrier_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL This turn, your next Attack is guaranteed to trigger Cleave.
CounterBarrier_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL This turn, your next Attack is guaranteed to trigger Cleave.

Craving_Blood.NAME: Craving for Blood
Craving_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each time you have inflicted Insanity this combat.

Immerse_Blood.NAME: Blood Dive
Immerse_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards. NL For each Attack discarded this way, apply 2 Taboo to all enemies. NL For each Skill discarded this way, gain 2 Tension.

HeavyBlow_Blood.NAME: Ponderous Blow
HeavyBlow_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL. If this card triggers Cleave, it will be triggered twice and will not reduce the enemy's Taboo stacks.

Rage_Blood.NAME: Mired in Delirium
Rage_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 3 Skills in a single turn, inflict !M! Insanity to a random enemy.

Bloodthirsty.NAME: Thirst for Vengeance
Bloodthirsty.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, deal !D! damage to all enemies, increased by !M! each time you lose HP this turn.

CastArmorWithBlood.NAME: Bloodcrafted Armor
CastArmorWithBlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, gain !B! Block. Whenever you deal Cleave damage, gain !M! Block.

TheEpreadOfTaboos_Blood.NAME: The Seven Taboos
TheEpreadOfTaboos_Blood.DESCRIPTION: At the start turn, apply !M! Taboo to ALL enemies. If there's only one enemy, apply 2 additional stacks of Taboo.

CriticalHitEnhancement_Blood.NAME: Seal Breaker
CriticalHitEnhancement_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Double the Taboo stacks of ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

KagomeKagome_Blood.NAME: Kagome Kagome
KagomeKagome_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least 2 stacks of Bloodthirst, remove a random buff from the target.

NoOneSurvived_Blood.NAME: And Then There Were None
NoOneSurvived_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage for the rest of this combat.

CastBloodWithArmor.NAME: Armored Blood
CastBloodWithArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, gain 1 Bloodthirst.

PainfulRoad_Blood.NAME: Painful Road
PainfulRoad_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each time you heal or lose HP this combat.

WhyIsItJustMe_Blood.NAME: The Pain of Solitude
WhyIsItJustMe_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Every 2 times you lose HP from a card, gain 1 Bloodthirst.
WhyIsItJustMe_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Every 2 times you lose HP from a card, gain 1 Bloodthirst.

ClockEngravedWithThePast_Blood.NAME: Clock That Ticks the Past
ClockEngravedWithThePast_Blood.DESCRIPTION: All enemies with debuffs lose HP at the end of their turn equal to the amount of unique debuffs on them.

Etching_Blood.NAME: Etched in Blood
Etching_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. NL Enemy loses 2 Strength. If the targeted enemy dies, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

ForbiddenShootingStars_Blood.NAME: Forbidden Shooting Stars
ForbiddenShootingStars_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal 1 additional damage and draw 1 card for each unique debuff on the enemy.

PowerTransformation_Blood.NAME: Blood Stimulant
PowerTransformation_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Put !M! random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand.

WaveformGettingStronger_Blood.NAME: Growing Waves
WaveformGettingStronger_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Tension. NL Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.

Human_Taboos_Blood.NAME: Human Taboos
Human_Taboos_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has at least 2 unique debuffs, apply !M! Insanity.

Earth_Taboo_Blood.NAME: Earth Taboos
Earth_Taboo_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Insanity to a random enemy 4 times.

Sky_Taboo_Blood.NAME: Heavenly Taboos
Sky_Taboo_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. Exhaust all cards in your hand. For each card Exhausted this way, draw a card and shuffle a random card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Sky_Taboo_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. Exhaust all cards in your hand. For each card Exhausted this way, draw a card and shuffle a random Upgraded card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

TheMadnessOfHeart_Blood.NAME: Heart of Madness
TheMadnessOfHeart_Blood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and gain 2 Tension.
TheMadnessOfHeart_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and gain 2 Tension.

BackFlow_Blood.NAME: Flow Reversal
BackFlow_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL If the last card played this combat was a Power, gain [E] again. Otherwise, draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
BackFlow_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL If the last card played this combat was a Power, gain [E] [E] . Otherwise, draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

LonelyNightmare_Blood.NAME: Lonely Nightmare
LonelyNightmare_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there's only one enemy, remove a random debuff from yourself. NL Exhaust.
LonelyNightmare_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there's only one enemy, remove a random debuff from yourself.

BloodRecovery.NAME: Bloody Collection
BloodRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

TheWillOfCrimson_Blood.NAME: Crimson Will
TheWillOfCrimson_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card triggers Cleave, gain !M! Strength.
TheWillOfCrimson_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this card triggers Cleave, gain !M! Strength.

GhostsAndShadows_Blood.NAME: Ghosts and Shadows
GhostsAndShadows_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are below 50% of maximum HP, gain !M! Dexterity.

SadisticKilling_Blood.NAME: Sadistic Murder
SadisticKilling_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has at least 2 unique debuffs, deal 6 additional damage to ALL enemies and apply 2 Insanity.

WhereTheHeartIs_Blood.NAME: Lost Heart
WhereTheHeartIs_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Insanity to ALL enemies twice.

TheEndOfMadness_Blood.NAME: End of Madness
TheEndOfMadness_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Strength. NL If the target has at least !M! unique debuffs, add a Sadistic Nature to your hand. NL Exhaust.

TheOnlyWill_Blood.NAME: Contemptous Will
TheOnlyWill_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !B! Block and inflict 1 Insanity on each unblocked hit (excluding Cleave damage).

EndlessFrenzy_Blood.NAME: Endless Frenzy
EndlessFrenzy_Blood.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Bloodthirst will not wear off. NL Exhaust.
EndlessFrenzy_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Bloodthirst will not wear off. NL Exhaust.

Subduction_Blood.NAME: The Unfinished Puzzle
Subduction_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Cleave. NL Lose 6 HP. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !M! Bloodthirst. NL If this card triggers Cleave, double the Bloodthirst stacks gained from this card.

Induce_Blood.NAME: Mindfray
Induce_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not have more than 1 unique debuff, apply Insanity twice.

FromTheInsideOut_Blood.NAME: From the Insides Out
FromTheInsideOut_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 3 cards from your hand. NL For each Status exhausted, gain 1 Artifact. For each Curse exhausted, apply 2 Insanity to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
FromTheInsideOut_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 3 cards from your hand. NL For each Status exhausted, gain 1 Artifact. For each Curse exhausted, apply 2 Insanity to ALL enemies.

Sustainable_Blood.NAME: Prolonged Hysteria
Sustainable_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Insanity 2 times. NL Draw 3 cards.

LetsPlayTogether_Blood.NAME: Let's Play Together!
LetsPlayTogether_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Insanity and gain !B! Block X times.

LetDestruction_Blood.NAME: Ruinous Despair
LetDestruction_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if this card would trigger Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
LetDestruction_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if this card would trigger Cleave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FourOfAKind_Blood.NAME: Four of a Kind
FourOfAKind_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lose 10 HP, 4 Strength, and 4 Dexterity. NL The first card you each turn is played 4 times.

TrueAncestors_Blood.NAME: True Ancestors
TrueAncestors_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL At the start of every 2 turns, gain 1 Intangible. NL You may no longer heal HP for the rest of this combat.
TrueAncestors_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL At the start of every 2 turns, gain 1 Intangible. NL You may no longer heal HP for the rest of this combat.

CrazyWithMe_Blood.NAME: Shared Psychosis

CrazyWithMe_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time an enemy takes damage, apply !M! Insanity to ALL enemies.

BloodTide.NAME: Rising Blood Tides
BloodTide.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal HP this combat, draw !M! cards.

RippleIn495_Blood.NAME: Ripple in 495 Years
RippleIn495_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Tension. NL For the rest of this combat, Cleave damage no longer reduces Taboo stacks.

Catadioptric_Blood.NAME: Catadioptric
Catadioptric_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand before playing this card (minimum 3).
Catadioptric_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand before playing this card (minimum 3).

BloodyCatastrophe_Blood.NAME: Bloody Catastrophe
BloodyCatastrophe_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and gain Block equal to the absolute difference between your current maximum HP and 50.
BloodyCatastrophe_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal damage and gain Block equal to the absolute difference between your current maximum HP and 50.

Laevatein_Blood.NAME: Laevateinn
Laevatein_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and !M! Bloodthirst. NL Increase [E] and Bloodthirst gained from this card by 1 for the rest of this combat.

LabyrinthOfLove_Blood.NAME: Labyrinth of Love
LabyrinthOfLove_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you lost HP this turn, double the amount of Block gained.

StarbowBreak_Blood.NAME: Starbow Break
StarbowBreak_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Apply 2 Insanity 2 times. NL Decrease the damage of this card by !M! this combat.

TheTruthOfTheEye_Blood.NAME: Weakness of the Eyes
TheTruthOfTheEye_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. NL For !M! turns, your Attacks deal double damage. NL Exhaust.

ToDrinkBitterly_blood.NAME: To Drink Bitterly
ToDrinkBitterly_blood.DESCRIPTION: Target loses 10% of their current HP. Heal HP equal to the amount of HP removed from the target. NL Exhaust.

CranberryTrap_Blood.NAME: Cranberry Trap
CranberryTrap_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength and Dexterity, where X is the number of times you lost HP this turn. NL Exhaust.
CranberryTrap_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Strength and Dexterity, where X is the number of times you lost HP this turn. NL Exhaust.

MakeFriendsWithMe_Blood.NAME: Endless Darkness
MakeFriendsWithMe_Blood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, randomly select a non-Attack card in your hand. If you play it, draw 2 cards next turn.
MakeFriendsWithMe_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, randomly select a non-Attack card in your hand. If you play it, draw 2 cards next turn.

WhereAreTheNewToys_Blood.NAME: Prismatic Vampire Wings
WhereAreTheNewToys_Blood.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
WhereAreTheNewToys_Blood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL your cards for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
